text:
Hello,

RewriteRule (.+)$ /var/www/$1 [L] <-- this expression used to work

RewriteRule ([^/]+)$ /var/www/$1 [L] <-- now I have to use something like this 
because the former gives an internal error.
creator: billy@frostytomato.com

text:
I'm missing two things:
- What exactly does the error log say?
- Did you test a more recent version? 2.0.40 is quite old and there won't be
fixed anything. 2.0.47 is the current version and 2.0.48 will come soon.

Thanks.
creator: nd@perlig.de
